array.string: In this series of levels, your baby robot is interacting with another baby robot controlled by another player.
Tap the "player" button to find a play partner (requires loggin in Game Center and iCoud).
Both of you must tap a command to produce an interation. This is a collaborative game. You both win at the same time.
Dance with your Little AI partner.
Make sure that the both of you are playing the same level.
More multi-player levels will be released in the coming months to illustrate research on human/robot collaboration.
